actions.args: {"handle": "tooling", "community_addon": {"id": "kp910a", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Tooling Community / WG Calls\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"subtitle\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"**Welcome to the Tooling Community and Work Group Calls page, where you can find recaps and information on previous community and work group calls related to NEAR DevHub and tooling development.**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Note: These formal calls are conducted to review specific proposals, discuss attestations, or vote on decisions**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### [Community Call] #1: Oct 6th, 2023\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**MODERATOR :** Maxwell S\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**VIDEO :** [Tools Community Group Call #1 \\\\u{2013} NEAR DevHub October 6th, 2023](https://youtu.be/vg9LYGLU7ok)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**AGENDA**\\\\\\\\n-  SourceScan presents the product and upcoming work\\\\\\\\n- Michael (Pagoda) presents bos-loader and workflow\\\\\\\\n- Guillermo presents BOS VSCode extension\\\\\\\\n- Elliot (DevHub) presents some of his toolchain/workflow for building BOS apps\\\\\\\\n  \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n----------\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### [Working Group Call] - January 19, 2023\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**MODERATOR :** Vlad Frolov\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**VIDEO :** [Tooling Working Group Call - January 19, 2023](https://youtu.be/poVmblmc3L4)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**AGENDA**\\\\\\\\n-   Update on Developer Governance and the NEP process\\\\\\\\n-   Introductions\\\\\\\\n-   Discussion: NEP-418 Proposal to allow attached_deposit in view contexts\\\\\\\\n-   Voting Decision\\\\\\\\n-   Getting Involved\\\\\\\\n  \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**NOTES**\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**- NEP-418 :** A proposal to implement an `attached_deposit` host function for view-function calls, so it would just return zero instead of aborting the function call. \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**VOTE DECISION**\\\\\\\\n-   NEP-418 : Approved\\\\\\\\n    \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**ACTION ITEMS**\\\\\\\\n- No action items were discussed\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**RELATED RESOURCES**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n- NEP-418 Proposal to allow attached_deposit in view contexts - [LINK](https://github.com/near/NEPs/pull/418)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n[Previous Meeting Notes](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1DGMpaS_X1MSoRae5R0ULClc5Dsv6KmWvfjicFZTJZ64)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n---------\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n  \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"textAlign\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"left\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "Community Calls / Events \\\\u{1f4fa}"}}
{"data": {"tooling.community.devhub.near": {"profile": {"name": "Tooling", "image": {"url": "https://ipfs.near.social/ipfs/bafkreie25uquonqegy2zq3mw22lxavscptdfx2awd5j5quzier62owceuu"}}}}}

{"addons": [{"id": "tqgmh9", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Overview\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"subtitle\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Validators hold a vital role in maintaining a decentralized, secure, and efficient network. This group was created to foster dialogue and engagement within NEAR\\\\u{2019}s validator community, ensure decentralization, and maintain a smoothly operating network. We believe that nurturing a robust community among validators is crucial for promoting the long-term stability of the NEAR ecosystem.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n## Our Groups\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nThe Validator community consists of two main groups:\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### Working Group\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nThis formal group is a selected committee of subject matter experts who make official decisions on proposals and questions related to NEAR\\\\u{2019}s Validators Ecosystem. They follow a strict process to review proposals, recommend funding to DAO or grant programs, and hold grant takers accountable. They engage with the broader community to understand their needs and encourage ideation.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Members**\\\\\\\\n- Denys Kovalenko - Stardust Staking, NEARWEEK\\\\\\\\n- Alan Estrada - Metapool\\\\\\\\n- [Mario Zito](https://github.com/mazito )\\\\\\\\n- [Will White](https://github.com/null-ref-ex)\\\\\\\\n- Paul\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### Community Group\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nThis informal self-organized group provides a space for anyone interested in making changes to the NEAR Validators Ecosystem. While this group does not make official decisions, it offers a great opportunity to meet with others to share ideas and submit proposals. This group is not controlled by anyone but the people who are organizing it. \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Communication Channels**\\\\\\\\n- [NEAR Validators Community Group in Telegram](https://t.me/joinchat/T12wrqSx66utgg-P)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"textAlign\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"left\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "About us \\\\u{2b50}\\\\u{fe0f}"}, {"id": "80oje0", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Events\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Stay up-to-date on upcoming and past events in the NEAR Validators Ecosystem. Whether it\\\\u{2019}s a monthly community call, meetup, or upcoming agenda, you\\\\u{2019}ll find the details here to connect with other community members.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n# Community Calls\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nThe Validator Community Group hosts a monthly call to connect, and foster communication, collaboration, and development within the NEAR ecosystem.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nThe call is organized by [NEARWEEK](https://twitter.com/NEARWEEK)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### How to join the call\\\\\\\\nFind out about the latest meetings below or on our [Telegram channel](https://t.me/joinchat/T12wrqSx66utgg-P)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### Who can attend\\\\\\\\nAnyone in the Validator community is welcome to attend the monthly call. Whether you\\\\\\'re an individual, an organization, or an expert in the Validators space, each call is recorded and posted on this page.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### Format\\\\\\\\nThe monthly call is an open-format discussion with some light moderation. Anyone can volunteer to facilitate and lead future calls. The agenda typically starts with introductions from participants and follows with a list of potential discussion topics. The group will prioritize the topics based on what participants want to discuss the most. Topics may include updates from members of the community, presentations on new research or projects, or general discussions.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### Meetings\\\\\\\\n| No. | Date                                   | Notes       | Recording |\\\\\\\\n|-----|----------------------------------------|-------------|-----------|\\\\\\\\n| 1   | Friday, April 28th, 2023, 15:00 UTC | [Summary](https://twitter.com/NEARValidators/status/1656360999266709506) | [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aDntRysPIk0) |\\\\\\\\n| 2   | Friday, June 02nd, 2023, 15:00 UTC | [Summary](https://twitter.com/NEARValidators/status/1669749923565428736) | [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G45YdrBFqDw) |\\\\\\\\n| 3   |Thursday, July 6th, 2023 15:00 UTC | **Cancelled** |\\\\\\\\n| 4   | Tuesday, Sept 19th, 2023, 15:00 UTC | [Summary](https://x.com/NEARValidators/status/1704683610723565973) | [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RV4NQKEPgIA) |\\\\\\\\n| -    | -     |\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n# Work Group Calls\\\\\\\\nThe Validators Work Group may host public formal calls to review specific proposals, discuss attestations, or vote on decisions. They will post upcoming calls below.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n# Upcoming calls\\\\\\\\nWe are taking the Validator community call to the real world for the first time at NEARCON 2023!\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nRSVP now! https://lu.ma/Chunktalks2023\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "Community Calls \\\\u{1f4fa}"}, {"id": "pfru78", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"How to get involved\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"subtitle\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n- Join the community group\\\\\\'s dedicated [Telegram channel](https://t.me/joinchat/T12wrqSx66utgg-P) to learn about the latest discussions and activities. Don\\\\u{2019}t forget to introduce yourself.\\\\\\\\n- Register for upcoming calls to connect with other members and experts. Review previous call notes/recordings.\\\\\\\\n- Participate in discussions, comment on existing ideas, or propose new ideas.\\\\\\\\n- Volunteer to speak about a topic or lead a meeting.\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"textAlign\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"left\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "Get Involved \\\\u{1f60e}"}, {"id": "0omg64", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{}", "display_name": "Updates \\\\u{1f468}\\\\u{200d}\\\\u{1f4bb}"}], "handle": "validators"}
{"data": {"validators.community.devhub.near": {"profile": {"name": "Validators", "image": {"url": "https://ipfs.near.social/ipfs/bafkreicumklo6hvy3tcr6i34fv57yu6npi43yr2ran5nhxu245ymala5bu"}}}}}

{"addons": [{"id": "hq1s0t", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Developer Relations at near/dev/hub \\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"subtitle\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"## About Us \\\\u{1f3c6}\\\\\\\\nWe are a dynamic team of community contributors dedicated to fostering the growth of the NEAR developer community. Our mission goes beyond engagement; we actively support developers through education, seamless onboarding, and collaborative development with NEAR\\\\\\'s open web stack. From gathering valuable feedback to orchestrating community calls and events, our commitment is to empower you as a developer and facilitate your journey in unlocking the full potential of NEAR Protocol.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n## The Team \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n1. @bpolania.near\\\\\\\\n   \\\\\\\\n   Areas of Contribution: Head of DevRel , Coordinating NEAR Campus.\\\\\\\\n   \\\\\\\\n2. @victorkanu1.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n   Areas of Contribution: Developer onboarding / engagement, Technical writing, workshops, Coordinating African initiatives, Hackathons. \\\\\\\\n   \\\\\\\\n3. @pivortex.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\tAreas of Contribution: Discord Support, Hosting workshops, Office Hours, Regional DevRel Support, Hackathons.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\t\\\\\\\\n4. @orangejoe.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n    Areas of Contribution: Developer Retention , Developer Onboarding, Developer Support. \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\t\\\\\\\\n5. @josecouto.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n    Areas of Contribution: DevHub Marketing , Twitter Management, Hackathons.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n   \\\\\\\\n6. @Flmel.near  \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n     Areas of Contribution: Developer Support, Documentation, Tooling, Office Hours.\\\\\\\\n  \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"textAlign\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"left\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "Meet the team \\\\u{2b50}\\\\u{fe0f}"}, {"id": "9uriqz", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "blog", "parameters": "{}", "display_name": "Resources / Blogs \\\\u{1f680}"}, {"id": "ftd6ha", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Office Hours \\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"subtitle\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\\nNEAR Developer Office Hours are held several times a week by DevHub or other community groups, and are a great way to level up your NEAR development or just meet other developers in the community! We host office hours on the NEAR [Discord](https://discord.com/invite/zfhfRpaM4m), which is also a great place to ask questions via chat!\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n#### NEAR DevHub - Developer Office Hours \\\\u{26a1}\\\\u{fe0f}\\\\\\\\n***When***: Thursday  - 11:00 \\\\u{2013} 12:00 UTC (1:00 PM - 2:00PM CEST) & 18:00 \\\\u{2013} 19:00 UTC (11AM - 12PM PST)\\\\\\\\n***Where***: NEAR official Discord Server \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"Developer Office Hours\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\" Channel \\\\\\\\n- https://discord.com/channels/490367152054992913/914965851646603264\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nJoin these sessions get dev support on your projects, chat about developing on NEAR and get to know the development community better\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n----- \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n#### NEAR Build DAO \\\\u{1f3c6}\\\\\\\\nOffice hours : Wednesday -  17:00 UTC / 12pm ET\\\\\\\\n \\\\u{201c}Hack-it Fridays\\\\u{201d}: Friday -  17:00 UTC / 12pm ET\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n***Where***: Info how to join these sessions can be found on the #support channel on the Build DAO Telegram https://www.nearbuilders.com/tg-builders\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n----\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n#### NEAR HORIZON Founder Fridays \\\\u{1f91d}\\\\\\\\n***When***: Friday -  14:30 - 15:15 UTC (15:30 CET) \\\\\\\\n***Where***: https://shortlink.near.foundation/horizon-office-hours-rsvp  (Requires Booking)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nContent geared toward Founders featuring: AMA\\\\\\'s from providers familiar with Web3 and NEAR ecosystem, ecosystem project demos, and updates from NDC, Horizon, and others...\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n-----\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n#### NEAR Chinese Developer Community Office Hours \\\\u{1f680}\\\\\\\\n***When***: Friday - 12:00 - 13:00 UTC (20:00-21:00 UTC +8)\\\\\\\\n***Where***: https://meeting.tencent.com/dm/srZlduGSaHfY\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nThe NEAR Chinese Developer Community Office Hour is held every Friday evening at 20:00 (UTC +8), featuring updates on NEAR engineering and ecosystem, course demos and open discussions.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nNEAR\\\\u{4e2d}\\\\u{6587}\\\\u{5f00}\\\\u{53d1}\\\\u{8005}\\\\u{793e}\\\\u{533a}\\\\u{7684}Office Hour\\\\u{6bcf}\\\\u{5468}\\\\u{4e94}\\\\u{665a}\\\\u{4e0a}20:00(UTC+8)\\\\u{4e3e}\\\\u{884c}\\\\u{ff0c}\\\\u{5185}\\\\u{5bb9}\\\\u{5305}\\\\u{62ec}NEAR\\\\u{5de5}\\\\u{7a0b}\\\\u{548c}\\\\u{751f}\\\\u{6001}\\\\u{7684}\\\\u{6700}\\\\u{65b0}\\\\u{8fdb}\\\\u{5c55}\\\\u{3001}\\\\u{8bfe}\\\\u{7a0b}\\\\u{6f14}\\\\u{793a}\\\\u{4ee5}\\\\u{53ca}\\\\u{5f00}\\\\u{653e}\\\\u{5f0f}\\\\u{8ba8}\\\\u{8bba}\\\\u{3002}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"textAlign\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"left\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "Office hours / Support \\\\u{1f468}\\\\u{200d}\\\\u{1f4bb}"}, {"id": "z2f3vh", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\" A Developer\\\\\\'s Guide to Active Participation in the DevHub\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"subtitle\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"**The DevHub Platform is your homebase for connecting with other developers and mentors, sharing ideas, proposing events, accessing resources, and finding communities working on diverse projects \\\\u{2013} from protocol development to tooling and documentation**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### Ways to Participate \\\\u{1f468}\\\\u{200d}\\\\u{1f4bb}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n- **Join a Community:** Explore communities [here](https://near.social/devhub.near/widget/app?page=communities).\\\\\\\\n- **Improve NEAR Documentation:** Contribute on [GitHub](https://github.com/near/docs).\\\\\\\\n- **Seek Mentorship:** Check out Office hours hosted on Discord and connect with all DevRels via our DevRel Telegram.\\\\\\\\n- **Host an Event/Hackathon:** Wunna host an event / hackathon? Power it up with [Hackbox](https://near.social/hackbox.near/widget/home).\\\\\\\\n- **Join NEAR Campus:** To support your blockchain club / university...Be part of [NEAR Campus](https://near.social/devhub.near/widget/app?page=community&handle=near-campus).\\\\\\\\n- **Post a Proposal:** Got an idea you\\\\\\'ll like to bring to the Ecosystem? Use this [Guide](https://near.social/devhub.near/widget/app?page=blog&id=203)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### How to Stay Updated:\\\\\\\\nSubscribe to our [newsletter](https://newsletter.neardevhub.org/) and join the Telegram group for the latest updates.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### Get Involved:\\\\\\\\nRegardless of your background or wherever you are in the world, we invite you to explore, find your community, and discover paths to contribute that are most gratifying for you. Let\\\\\\'s build the open web together!\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"textAlign\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"left\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "How to use DevHub? \\\\u{1f914}"}], "handle": "devrel"}

{"data": {"devrel.community.devhub.near": {"profile": {"name": "Decentralized DevRel", "image": {"url": "https://ipfs.near.social/ipfs/bafkreignlfyjejbvnclxbkiybjejjjqgelvrjyqxd4gscb2maoy3qw7ame"}}}}}

{"addons": [{"id": "hq1s0t", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Developer Relations at near/dev/hub \\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"subtitle\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"## About Us \\\\u{1f3c6}\\\\\\\\nWe are a dynamic team of community contributors dedicated to fostering the growth of the NEAR developer community. Our mission goes beyond engagement; we actively support developers through education, seamless onboarding, and collaborative development with NEAR\\\\\\'s open web stack. From gathering valuable feedback to orchestrating community calls and events, our commitment is to empower you as a developer and facilitate your journey in unlocking the full potential of NEAR Protocol.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n## The Team \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n1. @bpolania.near\\\\\\\\n   \\\\\\\\n   Areas of Contribution: Head of DevRel , Coordinating NEAR Campus.\\\\\\\\n   \\\\\\\\n2. @victorkanu1.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n   Areas of Contribution: Developer onboarding / engagement, Technical writing, workshops, Coordinating African initiatives, Hackathons. \\\\\\\\n   \\\\\\\\n3. @pivortex.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\tAreas of Contribution: Discord Support, Hosting workshops, Office Hours, Regional DevRel Support, Hackathons.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\t\\\\\\\\n4. @orangejoe.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n    Areas of Contribution: Developer Retention , Developer Onboarding, Developer Support. \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\t\\\\\\\\n5. @josecouto.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n    Areas of Contribution: DevHub Marketing , Twitter Management, Hackathons.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n   \\\\\\\\n6. @Flmel.near  \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n     Areas of Contribution: Developer Support, Documentation, Tooling, Office Hours.\\\\\\\\n  \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"textAlign\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"left\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "Meet the team \\\\u{2b50}\\\\u{fe0f}"}, {"id": "9uriqz", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "blog", "parameters": "{}", "display_name": "Resources / Blogs \\\\u{1f680}"}, {"id": "ftd6ha", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Office Hours \\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"subtitle\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\\nNEAR Developer Office Hours are held several times a week by DevHub or other community groups, and are a great way to level up your NEAR development or just meet other developers in the community! "display_name": "Office hours / Support \\\\u{1f468}\\\\u{200d}\\\\u{1f4bb}"}, {"id": "z2f3vh", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\" A Developer\\\\\\'s Guide to Active Participation in the DevHub\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"subtitle\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"**The DevHub Platform is your homebase for connecting with other developers and mentors, sharing ideas, proposing events, accessing resources, and finding communities working on diverse projects \\\\u{2013} from protocol development to tooling and documentation**\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### Ways to Participate \\\\u{1f468}\\\\u{200d}\\\\u{1f4bb}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n- **Join a Community:** Explore communities [here](https://near.social/devhub.near/widget/app?page=communities).\\\\\\\\n- **Improve NEAR Documentation:** Contribute on [GitHub](https://github.com/near/docs).\\\\\\\\n- **Seek Mentorship:** Check out Office hours hosted on Discord and connect with all DevRels via our DevRel Telegram.\\\\\\\\n- **Host an Event/Hackathon:** Wunna host an event / hackathon? Power it up with [Hackbox](https://near.social/hackbox.near/widget/home).\\\\\\\\n- **Join NEAR Campus:** To support your blockchain club / university...Be part of [NEAR Campus](https://near.social/devhub.near/widget/app?page=community&handle=near-campus).\\\\\\\\n- **Post a Proposal:** Got an idea you\\\\\\'ll like to bring to the Ecosystem? Use this [Guide](https://near.social/devhub.near/widget/app?page=blog&id=203)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### How to Stay Updated:\\\\\\\\nSubscribe to our [newsletter](https://newsletter.neardevhub.org/) and join the Telegram group for the latest updates.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### Get Involved:\\\\\\\\nRegardless of your background or wherever you are in the world, we invite you to explore, find your community, and discover paths to contribute that are most gratifying for you. Let\\\\\\'s build the open web together!\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"textAlign\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"left\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "How to use DevHub? \\\\u{1f914}"}, {"id": "dqnckr", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{}", "display_name": "Updates \\\\u{26a1}\\\\u{fe0f}"}], "handle": "devrel"}

{"addons": [{"id": "hq1s0t", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Developer Relations at near/dev/hub \\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"subtitle\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"## About Us \\\\u{1f3c6}\\\\\\\\nWe are a dynamic team of community contributors dedicated to fostering the growth of the NEAR developer community. Our mission goes beyond engagement; we actively support developers through education, seamless onboarding, and collaborative development with NEAR\\\\\\'s open web stack. From gathering valuable feedback to orchestrating community calls and events, our commitment is to empower you as a developer and facilitate your journey in unlocking the full potential of NEAR Protocol.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n## The Team \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n1. @bpolania.near\\\\\\\\n   \\\\\\\\n   Areas of Contribution: Head of DevRel , Coordinating NEAR Campus.\\\\\\\\n   \\\\\\\\n2. @victorkanu1.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n   Areas of Contribution: Developer onboarding / engagement, Technical writing, workshops, Coordinating African initiatives, Hackathons. \\\\\\\\n   \\\\\\\\n3. @pivortex.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\tAreas of Contribution: Discord Support, Hosting workshops, Office Hours, Regional DevRel Support, Hackathons.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\t\\\\\\\\n4. @orangejoe.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n    Areas of Contribution: Developer Retention , Developer Onboarding, Developer Support. \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\t\\\\\\\\n5. @josecouto.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n    Areas of Contribution: DevHub Marketing , Twitter Management, Hackathons.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n   \\\\\\\\n6. @Flmel.near  \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n     Areas of Contribution: Developer Support, Documentation, Tooling, Office Hours.\\\\\\\\n  \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"textAlign\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"left\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "Meet the team \\\\u{2b50}\\\\u{fe0f}"}, {"id": "9uriqz", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "blog", "parameters": "{}", "display_name": "Resources / Blogs \\\\u{1f680}"}, {"id": "ftd6ha", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Office Hours \\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"subtitle\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\\nNEAR Developer Office Hours are held several times a week by DevHub or other community groups, and are a great way to level up your NEAR development or just meet other developers in the community! {"addons": [{"id": "p56v0f", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Overview\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"# \\\\u{1f44b} Welcome!\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nThis community is all about delivering high impact features to the [NEAR DevHub Platform](http://neardevhub.org), a decentralized community platform for NEAR developers to contribute to the ecosystem and stay informed. This space aims to serve as an entry point to individuals, experts, and organizations who are interested in contributing. \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n## Our Groups\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nWe have two main groups:\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### 1. Working group\\\\\\\\nThis formal group is a group of subject matter experts who make official decisions on proposals and questions related to the DevHub Platform. They follow a strict process to review proposals, recommend funding to DAO, and hold grant takers accountable. They also engage with the broader community to understand their needs and encourage ideation. \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Members**\\\\\\\\n- @frol.near\\\\\\\\n- @ori.near\\\\\\\\n- @bo.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### 2. Community contributors\\\\\\\\nWe have a core group of regular product & technical community contributors who regularly work on making the DevHub platform better, from contributing code to reporting and triaging issues. These individuals collaborate across different time zones using lightweight and mostly asynchronous processes. To learn more about how we work, check out our project [README](https://github.com/near/neardevhub-widgets#how-to-contribute) page on GitHub.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n## What are we working on?\\\\\\\\nTo track our progress and manage issues effectively, we use a [Kanban board](https://github.com/orgs/near/projects/60/views/1). You can also check out our [current](https://github.com/near/neardevhub-widgets/milestones) and [past](https://github.com/near/neardevhub-widgets/milestones?state=closed) initiatives.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n## Communication channels\\\\\\\\nWe use the following channels for communication:\\\\\\\\n- [GitHub:](https://github.com/orgs/near/projects/60/views/1) For specific issues and pull requests. Enable notifications to ensure you get the latest updates.\\\\\\\\n- [Telegram:](https://t.me/devhubplatform) For general questions or concerns.\\\\\\\\n- [Weekly Standup Calls](https://bit.ly/DevHubCalendar): To align on priorities and discuss progress, plans, and blockers.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n## How to get involved\\\\\\\\nAnyone is welcome to contribute to the DevHub platform. Here are ways to get involved:\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n* **Contribute code**: Review the list of [good first issues](https://github.com/near/devgigsboard-widgets/contribute). You can pick any issues from the [Backlog column](https://github.com/orgs/near/projects/60) and indicate your interest by leaving comments. Before you get started, we encourage you to check out [how we work](https://github.com/near/devgigsboard-widgets/blob/main/docs/how-we-work.md) and the [developer guidelines](https://github.com/near/devgigsboard-widgets/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md).\\\\\\\\n* **Report issues**: To report a [bug](https://github.com/near/devgigsboard-widgets/issues/new?assignees=&labels=bug&template=bug_report.md&title=) or a [feature request](https://github.com/near/devgigsboard-widgets/issues/new?assignees=&labels=enhancement&template=feature-request.md&title=), please review all open and closed [issues](https://github.com/near/devgigsboard-widgets/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aall+) to make sure no one has previously created a similar topic. If you have a more robust proposal or idea that you\\\\\\'d like to discuss, you are also welcome to create an idea or solution post on our community here.\\\\\\\\n* **Triage issues**: You are welcome to help us triage by verifying or reproducing bugs, adding more specific reproduction instructions, or voting on issues by adding a \\\\u{1f44d} thumbs-up reaction to the issue\\\\\\'s description comment.  \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n### How to become a paid contributor\\\\\\\\nAs an an open-source project, we greatly approach the contributions of each individual. We aim to grow an ecosystem of developers who are here because they like the technology and community. Given that there\\\\u{2019}s a lot of time and effort that goes into this, we have financial means to compensate for some activities and projects for regular contributors.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nIf you are interested in getting compensate for contributing your skills and expertise to our project, the best way to get started is to first familiarize yourself with [DevHub](https://www.neardevhub.org) and start getting involved (see section above). Once you\\\\u{2019}ve gained the community\\\\u{2019}s trust by demonstrating high-quality contributions and ongoing commitment, you can [apply here](https://near.social/#/devgovgigs.near/widget/gigs-board.pages.Post?id=507). \\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "About us \\\\u{2b50}\\\\u{fe0f}"}, {"id": "870s2b", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{}", "display_name": "How to use DevHub \\\\u{1f468}\\\\u{200d}\\\\u{1f4bb}"}], "handle": "devhub-platform"}

{"addons": [{"id": "hq1s0t", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Developer Relations at near/dev/hub \\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"subtitle\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"## About Us \\\\u{1f3c6}\\\\\\\\nWe are a dynamic team of community contributors dedicated to fostering the growth of the NEAR developer community. Our mission goes beyond engagement; we actively support developers through education, seamless onboarding, and collaborative development with NEAR\\\\\\'s open web stack. From gathering valuable feedback to orchestrating community calls and events, our commitment is to empower you as a developer and facilitate your journey in unlocking the full potential of NEAR Protocol.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n## The Team \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n1. @bpolania.near\\\\\\\\n   \\\\\\\\n   Areas of Contribution: Head of DevRel , Coordinating NEAR Campus.\\\\\\\\n   \\\\\\\\n2. @victorkanu1.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n   Areas of Contribution: Developer onboarding / engagement, Technical writing, workshops, Coordinating African initiatives, Hackathons. \\\\\\\\n   \\\\\\\\n3. @pivortex.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\tAreas of Contribution: Discord Support, Hosting workshops, Office Hours, Regional DevRel Support, Hackathons.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\t\\\\\\\\n4. @orangejoe.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n    Areas of Contribution: Developer Retention , Developer Onboarding, Developer Support. \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\t\\\\\\\\n5. @josecouto.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n    Areas of Contribution: DevHub Marketing , Twitter Management, Hackathons.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n   \\\\\\\\n6. @Flmel.near  \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n     Areas of Contribution: Developer Support, Documentation, Tooling, Office Hours.\\\\\\\\n  \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"textAlign\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"left\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "Meet the team \\\\u{2b50}\\\\u{fe0f}"}, {"id": "9uriqz", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "blog", "parameters": "{}", "display_name": "Resources / Blogs \\\\u{1f680}"}, {"id": "ftd6ha", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{\\\\\\\"title\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Office Hours \\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"subtitle\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"content\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\\nNEAR Developer Office Hours are held several times a week by DevHub or other community groups, and are a great way to level up your NEAR development or just meet other developers in the community! We host office hours on the NEAR [Discord](https://discord.com/invite/zfhfRpaM4m), which is also a great place to ask questions via chat!\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n#### NEAR DevHub - Developer Office Hours \\\\u{26a1}\\\\u{fe0f}\\\\\\\\n***When***: Thursday  - 11:00 \\\\u{2013} 12:00 UTC (1:00 PM - 2:00PM CEST) & 18:00 \\\\u{2013} 19:00 UTC (11AM - 12PM PST)\\\\\\\\n***Where***: NEAR official Discord Server \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"Developer Office Hours\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\" Channel \\\\\\\\n- https://discord.com/channels/490367152054992913/914965851646603264\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nJoin these sessions get dev support on your projects, chat about developing on NEAR and get to know the development community better\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n----- \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n#### NEAR Build DAO \\\\u{1f3c6}\\\\\\\\nOffice hours : Wednesday -  17:00 UTC / 12pm ET\\\\\\\\n \\\\u{201c}Hack-it Fridays\\\\u{201d}: Friday -  17:00 UTC / 12pm ET\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n***Where***: Info how to join these sessions can be found on the #support channel on the Build DAO Telegram https://www.nearbuilders.com/tg-builders\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n----\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n#### NEAR HORIZON Founder Fridays \\\\u{1f91d}\\\\\\\\n***When***: Friday -  14:30 - 15:15 UTC (15:30 CET) \\\\\\\\n***Where***: https://shortlink.near.foundation/horizon-office-hours-rsvp  (Requires Booking)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nContent geared toward Founders featuring: AMA\\\\\\'s from providers familiar with Web3 and NEAR ecosystem, ecosystem project demos, and updates from NDC, Horizon, and others...\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n-----\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n#### NEAR Chinese Developer Community Office Hours \\\\u{1f680}\\\\\\\\n***When***: Friday - 12:00 - 13:00 UTC (20:00-21:00 UTC +8)\\\\\\\\n***Where***: https://meeting.tencent.com/dm/srZlduGSaHfY\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nThe NEAR Chinese Developer Community Office Hour is held every Friday evening at 20:00 (UTC +8), featuring updates on NEAR engineering and ecosystem, course demos and open discussions.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nNEAR\\\\u{4e2d}\\\\u{6587}\\\\u{5f00}\\\\u{53d1}\\\\u{8005}\\\\u{793e}\\\\u{533a}\\\\u{7684}Office Hour\\\\u{6bcf}\\\\u{5468}\\\\u{4e94}\\\\u{665a}\\\\u{4e0a}20:00(UTC+8)\\\\u{4e3e}\\\\u{884c}\\\\u{ff0c}\\\\u{5185}\\\\u{5bb9}\\\\u{5305}\\\\u{62ec}NEAR\\\\u{5de5}\\\\u{7a0b}\\\\u{548c}\\\\u{751f}\\\\u{6001}\\\\u{7684}\\\\u{6700}\\\\u{65b0}\\\\u{8fdb}\\\\u{5c55}\\\\u{3001}\\\\u{8bfe}\\\\u{7a0b}\\\\u{6f14}\\\\u{793a}\\\\u{4ee5}\\\\u{53ca}\\\\u{5f00}\\\\u{653e}\\\\u{5f0f}\\\\u{8ba8}\\\\u{8bba}\\\\u{3002}\\\\\\\\n \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"textAlign\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"left\\\\\\\"}", "display_name": "Office hours \\\\u{1f468}\\\\u{200d}\\\\u{1f4bb}"}, {"id": "dqnckr", "enabled": true, "addon_id": "wiki", "parameters": "{}", "display_name": "Updates \\\\u{26a1}\\\\u{fe0f}"}], "handle": "devrel"}
